item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, My name is Jun-Liszt Li. Currently, I am a graduate student in PKU-CIBR joint program of Peking University, working on Next-generation omics (scRNAseq; Spatial metabolomics) technology, and next-generation microscopy (Lightsheet, Confocal, 2p), in order to understand the fundamental basis of brain metabolism and brain vasculature system. Interest Areas Brain vasculature system Brain metabolic system scRNAseq & Spatial transcriptome Spatial metabolomics AAV engineering Promoter engineering Education Ph.D., Peking University, Beijing SEPTEMBER 2018 — PRESENT Academy for Advanced Interdisciplinary Studies(AAIS) Major in Neuroscience; CIBR-PKU-joint Ph.
